prompt: The scene captures the enchanting celebration of a timeless wedding in a picturesque garden setting, brimming with natural elegance and sophistication. Under the watchful canopy of towering willow trees draped in delicate fairy lights, a couple stands at the altar, surrounded by a semi-circle of joyful guests seated on white wooden chairs. Each chair is adorned with small bouquets of lavender and babyâ€™s breath, lending an air of softness and charm. The couple, resplendent in their attire, exchange vows with serene expressions, their hands tenderly entwined, as a soft breeze gently rustles the leaves. The camera is positioned at eye level, ensuring an intimate yet comprehensive view of the event, capturing both the couple and their reverent audience in a balanced composition. The foreground is occupied by a decorative aisle runner made of rose petals, leading the eye toward the altar, while the willow trees create a natural frame in the background. The afternoon sun bathes the scene in a warm, golden glow, accentuating the vibrant green of the grass and the soft pastels of the floral arrangements. Shadows dance playfully among the guests, who are illuminated with gentle dapples of light filtering through the leaves. The color palette is a harmonious blend of greens, whites, and lavenders, evoking a mood of tranquil joy and understated elegance. The overall style is reminiscent of lifestyle photography, capturing candid interactions and spontaneous expressions of emotion with a soft focus that adds a dreamy quality. The image is characterized by its high resolution and fine detail, ensuring each tender moment is preserved with clarity and precision, a testament to professional artistry and technical prowess.

description: The wedding scene takes place under towering willow trees with fairy lights.
A couple stands at the altar, exchanging vows in front of joyful guests.
White wooden chairs with floral decorations are arranged in a semi-circle.
